thread.title: Rock n' rollers Hothouse Flowers set for Hampshire date
thread.title_full: Rock n' rollers Hothouse Flowers set for Hampshire date

title: Rock n' rollers Hothouse Flowers set for Hampshire date
text:
0 comments 
SHAPED by over 30 years of singing and playing all over the world, Hothouse Flowers bring their unique live show to the Guildhall stage this weekend. 
Rock n roll band, traditional band, soul band, jam band, Hothouse Flowers are still writing songs and wowing live despite their lengthy career which is now heading into its fourth decade. 
Hothouse Flowers are: Liam O Maonlai: Vocals, piano, bodhr√°n, guitar, Fiachna O Braonain: Vocals, guitar, tin whistle, Peter O Toole: Vocals, bass, bouzouki, Dave Clarke: Drums and percussion and Martin Brunsden: Vocals, double bass. Share article 
Enjoy their grand repertoire at 02 Guildhall Southampton on Sunday. 
* Call 023 8063 2601 or visit 02guildhallsouthampton.co.uk Promoted Stories Rock n' rollers Hothouse Flowers set for Hampshire date Sorry, an error occurred.
